thread.title: First but not Last Visit
thread.title_full: First but not Last Visit - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Battery Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ThisMomTravels2
title: First but not Last Visit
text: Had an amazing time here. Location was better than we thought. Plenty to do nearby or grab the 1 train. Kids loved the view of Lady Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. The Club was great. Wendy went above and beyond always with a smile (unlike another gentleman who was grumpy to say the least). Front desk staff went above and beyond to make our first experience so memorable. We will definitely be back!
